rooms.description: Spacious living room with large windows for natural light, designed to face the east and north sides in adherence to Vastu.
Dining room adjacent to living room, providing a flow between spaces and enhanced ventilation.
Guest bedroom with east-facing window for morning light and fresh air.
Master bedroom with a south-facing aspect to maintain Vastu harmony and provide ample sunlight.
Bathroom adjoining master bedroom for privacy and efficient access.

openings.description: Main entrance aligned with Vastu guidelines for prosperity.
Secondary entrance with enhanced security features.
Large windows in living room to maximize natural light.
Windows to facilitate cross ventilation in dining room.

plot.description: The plot is oriented with the west side as primary exposure, ensuring that all design elements align with natural light flow and Vastu principles.

swimming_pool.description: Swimming pool designed to complement the villa's aesthetics while ensuring privacy and adherence to local building norms.

vastu_considerations.lighting: east and south-east are emphasized for optimal morning light.
vastu_considerations.ventilation: Strategic placement of windows ensures cross ventilation throughout the villa.
